description: Hooded Horse sure do pick some gems to publish with the latest announcement being Drill Keeper from ShoulderByte GmbH that looks like an intoxicating mix of genres.
title: Drill Keeper seems to have it all with deckbuilding, tower defense and roguelite survival

description: Some exciting news for hardware enthusiasts, as Framework just announced today that DeepComputing has made the first partner-developed mainboard with RISC-V.
title: RISC-V Framework Laptop mainboard teased, plus open source releases of laptop shells

description: Almost every day we see an influx of games that go through Steam Deck compatibility verification, so here's a fresh set for you to consider picking up like KINGDOM HEARTS.
title: KINGDOM HEARTS and many more games get Steam Deck Verified

description: Roots of Pacha is getting a big 1.2 update on July 31st, bringing with it plenty of expanded options for this prehistoric farming life sim.
title: Roots of Pacha v1.2 out in July adds more romance, more customization, puts kids in school

description: KDE Plasma 6.1 has been released today bringing with it plenty of exciting new features, some big and some small but there's plenty to enjoy.
title: Plasma 6.1 released with Explicit Sync, Triple Buffering for Wayland and much more

description: Powered by Unreal Engine 5, The Nightscarred: Forgotten Gods from Shadowfall Studios is an immersive first-person action genre, combining a powerful spellcrafting system with hybrid combat mechanics that allow players to wield crafted magical abilities and melee weapons independently.
title: The hybrid combat mechanics in The Nightscarred: Forgotten Gods sounds exciting

description: Developer inDirection Games announced their cute looking gardening game Horticular is now set to arrive on July 11th. Here you are summoned by a bunch of mysterious gnomes, given the task of breathing new life into a long-lost garden, abandoned by its previous caretaker.
title: Restore a garden back to life in Horticular coming in July

description: Squad from Offworld is a tactical first-person shooter that has run on Linux for a while now with Proton, but some Linux distributions had issues with Easy Anti-Cheat (EAC).
title: Squad, Offworld's tactical FPS should now run better on Linux with EAC issues fixed
